column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////The food here is amazing! I've been for dinner and just recently brunch for my boyfriend's birthday! They were so accommodating all throughout brunch! Excellent service
column2: they didn't fuss about splitting the check by couples (like so many places do)
column3: they put candles on the bday cake I brought
column4: even stored the cake for us and cut and served it to us! Again
column5: amazing service! The environment is great too
column6: especially on a nice day! Thank you
column7: Bosscat for making my boyfriend's bday a great one! we will be back!
